mapper.insert: insert into tuser (sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sTelephone, sEmail, sAddUserCode) values (#{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{susername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suserstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suserlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saddusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tuser set sBankCode = #{sbankcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserName = #{susername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sPassword = #{spassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserState = #{suserstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserLevel = #{suserlevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sUserOnTime = #{suserontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sPWDError = #{spwderror,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sTelephone = #{stelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sEmail = #{semail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sAddUserCode = #{saddusercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sUserCode = #{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sUserOnTime, sPWDError, sTelephone, sEmail, sAddUserCode from tuser where sUserCode = #{susercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select sUserCode, sBankCode, sUserName, sPassword, sUserState, sUserLevel, sUserOnTime, sPWDError, sTelephone, sEmail, sAddUserCode from tuser

select a.sUserCode, a.sBankCode, a.sUserName, b.sBankName, a.sUserState, a.sUserLevel, a.sUserOnTime, a.sPWDError, a.sTelephone, a.sEmail, a.sAddUserCode from tuser as a, torga as b where a.sAddUserCode = #{addUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.sBankCode = b.sBankCode
select * from tuser where sAddUserCode = #{addUserCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sUserLevel = '2' and sUserState = '0'
